docs.title: Welcome to the e-footprint documentation !
docs.text:
A toolkit for exhaustively modeling the environmental impact of digital services.

This project has been initiated by Vincent Villet for Publicis Sapient and is now part of the green IT association Boavizta’s ecosystem of open source tools. Please check out e-footprint’s Boavizta repository for access to the latest work, and e-footprint’s Boavizta documentation for more information on the project.
